Text:
kegir -- Whoa! 

Three *great* films -- by Fassbinder, Kiarosami, and Wong Kar Wai -- within 65 minutes?

I've hope you've got good bandwidth, dude!

Oh, and by the way, just in case it wasn't clear from the above...

Thanks!

I hope you enjoy the films jgabriel and thanks for the comment. One thing with TPB is that there a so few comments. I do not up things to get comments though. If one person download and like the film is good for me. 10 Mbit/s is my up speed.
Thank you very much for this!  Feichang ganxie!
